name: Rainmaker Doroh
description:
Settings

RainMaker Doroh takes place in a drought area where you the Shaman will solve puzzle to get materia to make it rain!

Controls: Keyboard 

  • Movement: W,A, S, D
  • Summon Rain: E
  • Start: Return

Bugs and errors: There aren't any critical bugs (that I know) that should prevent you from playing the game

Donations / Ratings?

If you like my game and would like to see more, please support the official release by providing some feedback ratings and or donations. Feedback is gold for me.
